<LI><H2>Grande Resource Discovery, Allocation and Scheduling
</H2>
<UL>
<LI>Recent JINI Sun technology looks attractive 
</UL></UL><UL>
<LI><H2>We are defining methods and properties of computers and programs viewed as distributed objects
</H2>
<UL>
<LI>Thus we are inevitability defining a CORBA facility for computing
</UL></UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Compiling, Executing, Specification of features needed for execution optimization
</H2>
<UL>
<LI>This includes parameters needed by MPI/HPF decompositions such as number of processors
